name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 25, Shangrao, Jiangxi. A retired teacher reported Mao Qi, secretary of the Wannian County Party Committee, for sexually assaulting his daughter (who was the former secretary of the Shangfang Township Party Committee of Wannian County) by name.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of July 25, a traffic police officer in Jiangmen, Guangdong, was checking motorcycles on the street and a man was pinned to the ground.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 26, Shenzhen, Guangdong. Urban management officers grabbed the fruit on an old man's electric bike and threw it at the law enforcement vehicle. The old man begged desperately. The person who filmed it said, "Isn't this a bandit?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 25 (Released) Guiyang, Guizhou. A woman went out wearing a suspender and was criticized by an old lady: "Young people should be more careful about the way they dress."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Tai'an, Shandong, a man posted a video saying that he was injured by radiation and his hands were ulcerated while working at Shandong Keyu Testing Service Co., Ltd. However, the outsourcing company and the factory did not care and did not advance the medical expenses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Supplementary correction: some netizens found that the video first appeared in May 2023

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 25, the National Medical Insurance Administration announced: Over 1.3 billion people have participated in the insurance program! my country's basic medical insurance program is operating steadily, and the fund is operating safely and sustainably. This was questioned and ridiculed by netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 25, a woman reported her husband, Yang Zhijun, a teacher at the School of Vehicle and Traffic Engineering of Taiyuan University of Science and Technology, under her real name, for serious domestic violence, sexual harassment of female students, and publication of indecent poetry, which attracted attention. The screenshots of the chat between Yang Zhijun and the female student showed that Yang Zhijun said, "Do you love me? Do you regret suffering for me? Do you fulfill your wife's responsibilities? Are you loyal to me?"
July 26 Taiyuan University of Science and Technology: Active investigation and verification is underway.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
Hongmeng harmonyos next system, webview built-in website blocking, the same as the website blocking of the browser that comes with the ordinary Huawei mobile phone system. This is based on network detection, which means that every URL you visit will be uploaded to Huawei.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 26, a video of an intern at CITIC Securities went viral.
In the video, the intern drove a Porsche to work and played golf after get off work. At the same time, the IPO project information of three companies, Wangyuan Technology, HaiRou Innovation, and Guoneng Xinkong, was directly leaked in the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Sichuan Yunlian County police reported a major criminal case in a community, where a man killed a woman and her family members and then committed suicide. An insider said the community where the incident occurred was called "Yunzhou International Community"
On July 25, the party secretary of Mazha Village, Puning City, Guangdong Province was stabbed by someone with a knife while picking up a courier, and the dispute resulted in one death and one injury.
In response, netizens responded: "My Douyin is killing from morning to night"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 25, Oriental Selection announced that its well-known anchor Dong Yuhui would leave. As soon as the news came out, the stock price of Oriental Selection opened lower on the 26th, plummeting by nearly 30%, hitting a new low since June 2022, and down 86% from the highest price of HK$75.55 in January 2023.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/n2IFgutlKt

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 25, Southern Weekend reported that Dongguan had a large number of companies illegally using child labor.
According to statistics in the article, during the summer vacation, the Dongguan Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau issued a total of 59 administrative penalty notices, 39 of which involved child labor issues. The illegal use of child labor is mainly concentrated in labor-intensive processing and manufacturing enterprises.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 26, the Ministry of Public Security and the Cyberspace Administration of China issued the "National Internet Identity Authentication Public Service Management Measures (Draft for Comments)". According to the "Measures", users can voluntarily apply for an Internet certificate and Internet number that corresponds to their natural person identity with valid legal identity documents such as resident identity cards, passports, and passes, which can be used to non-explicitly register or verify their real identity information in Internet services and relevant departments, industry management, and services.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 26, near Tianshuiyuan in Liulitun Street, Chaoyang District, Beijing, urban management officers tried to snatch a vendor's tricycle. Her fried dough twists were scattered all over the ground.

content: July 26, Chaozhou water situation

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, Xinhua News Agency reported that Mao Qi, secretary of the Wannian County Party Committee in Jiangxi Province, was suspected of serious violations of discipline and law and was subject to disciplinary review and supervision investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the police in Huizhou, Guangdong, notified local landlords that the police WeChat robot would enter every tenant WeChat group and ask the landlord to send his rental group invitation code for the "Hui Xiaojing" to enter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 26, a stabbing attack occurred at Nanxing Square in Yulin, Guangxi. A child was injured.
